short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fortnite Chibi Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Fortnite Chibi background. Fortnite Chibi wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Rotate Fortnite Chibi wallpapers each time you open a new tab.
2. Toggle or favorite Fortnite Chibi backgrounds in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google Search bar.
4. Direct links to email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New note feature to jot down reminders and tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited sites.
8. Streamlined access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to add websites for rapid access.
10. Immediate entry to Google applications.
11. Quick link to explore more themes.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Instant access to download new wallpapers.
14. Fast access to games.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on your Fortnite Chibi new tab.
